channel.title: Health Glitch - WTF!
channel.description:
Here's pic of the glitch - when you logout then in your health will be 12/9 or something...

item.title: Health Glitch - WTF!
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

no i think this
go to you player.java and search for “for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels”
then u will c something like this : if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = 13500000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }
change 99 to what level u want here * 99/* and also the exp of the level u want at *
then go client.java and search for

loggedinpm(); updatePlayers(); if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) < 99) {
u will c “playerXP[3] = …;”
change the … to 13500000 or more for having 99hp

i hope it works now
feel free to pm me if it doesn’t work

Read full topic
